description: Main entry point of a Flutter application that sets up themes, routing, and initializes providers with some startup logic.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, manages theme, routing, and provider initialization.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for MyApp, handles initialization logic and build method.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application's entry point, sets up environment and runs the app.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes internal state, sets up API client.

methods.name: _initializeProviders
methods.description: Asynchronously initializes app state providers such as auth, settings, games, and leaderboard.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, setting up a FutureBuilder to handle initialization states.
